Focus on These Conferences and Journals

Tuesday 20 October 2015

arXiv e-Prints

  1. Quantum Physics in arXiv. My interested papers (on quantum walks) are extracted from arXiv and re-typesetted here in more redable format.

Journals

  1. SIAM Journal on Computing (SICOMP). Email alert set.
  2. Physical Review Letters (PRL),
    Physical Review A (PRA),
    Review of Modern Physics (RMP). Email alerts set.
  3. Scientific Reports,
    Nature Communications,
    Scientific American and some others from Nature. Email alerts set.
  4. Quantum Information Processing (QIP). Email alert set.
  5. Quantum Information & Computation. No email alert.
  6. International Journal of Quantum Information. Email alert possibly set, I am not sure. Need verification.
  7. Theory of Computing (ToC). Email alert set. There are some valuable papers on quantum computing.
  8. 软件学报. Email alert set.
  9. 计算机研究与发展 (Journal of Computer Research and Development). Email alert set.
